Package kademlia.routing

Class Contact

java.lang.Object
kademlia.routing.Contact
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Contact>
public class Contact
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Contact>
Keeps information about contacts of the Node; Contacts are stored in the Buckets in the Routing Table. Contacts are used instead of nodes because more information is needed than just the node information. - Information such as -- Last seen time
Since:
20140425

    When a Node sees a contact a gain, the Node will want to update that it's seen recently, this method updates the last seen timestamp for this contact.

    • setSeenNow

      public void setSeenNow()
      When a Node sees a contact a gain, the Node will want to update that it's seen recently, this method updates the last seen timestamp for this contact.
